Source code for dianRongQa.database.mysqlUtil

# -*- coding:utf-8 -*-
import pymysql
from dianRongQa.log.log import Log
import pdb


[docs]class MysqlUtil(object):
    def __init__(self, host, user, passwd, db, port= 3306):
        self.conn  = None
        try: 
            self.conn = pymysql.connect(host = host, user = user, passwd = passwd, db = db, port = int(port), charset='utf8')
        except:
            Log.log_error_info("fail to connect db %s %s %s %s %s \n" % (host, user, passwd, db, port))
    
    #查询mysql语句
    #sql_str 为查询语句

[docs]    def query(self, sql_str): 
        result = []  
        cur = self.conn.cursor()
        cur.execute(sql_str)
        result = cur.fetchall()
        return result 

    
    #执行mysql语句
    #sql_str 为语句

[docs]    def  do_no_query_action(self, sql_str):
        result = []  
        cur = self.conn.cursor()
        result = cur.execute(sql_str)
        return result
